I tried doing what I said earlier (testing using JUnit and the KVM 
with Ant) and it didn't work. There were problems with the 
preverifying that I couldn't get around. Oh well, it no big 
deal 'cause the separation of the business logic stuff you suggested 
works great!

thanks.
